title: Nyan Koi!
synopsis: Junpei Kousaka is a second-year high school student who has an allergy for catsâ€”a predicament that has made him hate cats and everything related to them. Unfortunately for him, though, he is surrounded by cat lovers: his family, his estranged childhood friend, and even his crush Kaede Mizuno.
